articles.author: Seán Federico-O'Murchú
articles.title: After an 8-year wait, the US men's soccer team will once again compete in a World Cup - CNN
articles.description: After an eight-year wait, the US Men's National team secured a spot Wednesday in the 2022 FIFA World Cup, although not in a way the team would have preferred.
articles.content:
After an eight-year wait, the US Mens National team secured a spot Wednesday in the 2022 FIFA World Cup, although not in a way the team would have preferred.

articles.author: Donald Judd and Paul LeBlanc, CNN
articles.title: Biden to mark Transgender Day of Visibility with new measures in support of transgender Americans - CNN
articles.description: The Biden administration is marking the International Transgender Day of Visibility on Thursday with a series of measures in support of transgender Americans as they face efforts to curb their rights across the country.

articles.author: Oliver O'Connell
articles.title: Biden news – live: US government weighing release of up to 1 million barrels of oil from strategic reserve - The Independent
articles.description: Biden new: Latest updates on Russia, Ukraine, Nato, Trump, Hunter Biden
